Room.Name: Dim Tunnel
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a dimly lighted tunnel near the castle's armory.
Room.LongDescription: There is nothing but blackness to the south. You have come far enough north, that you must be close to the armory of Prince Ragnar. This tunnel is wide enough to pull a cart through it. Small animals and large insects infest this place, and seem to be at war with one another. Looking through the crawlway, you see the armory.
